content.paragraph: The Basilisks that players collect are represented with NFTs on Ethereum's blockchain with real-world value. Players use the Basilisks they have gathered to battle other players to win ether (ETH).

In Balthazar Dragons, players are immersed in a 3D open world to explore and capture dragon-like beasts called Basilisks. Balthazar Dragons is an upcoming fantasy role-playing game developed on the Ethereum blockchain by a decentralized autonomous organization (DAO) called the Balthazar DAO.

quote.text: The first huge metaverse arena to arrange live sports, hang out and even make bets and wagers
